preqs: SCI1020, VCE Mathematical methods 3 and 4, or equivalent international qualifications listed in the Unit Guide.

rules.ruleString: Unit was previously coded {GAS1631, MAT1060, MAT1711, MAT1722, MTH1210, MTH2210, STA1010%}

(Incompatible with achievement in (I/W) {BUS1100, ETW1000, ETW1102, ETX1100, FIT1006, MAT1097, STA2010} and  Incompatible with course version in {1469, B2023} with course status in {ENROLLED, INACTIVE, INTERMIT})

proh: ETC1000, ETW1000, ETW1102, ETX1100, FIT1006 and MAT1097.Note: students who have completed STA1010 cannot subsequently undertake SCI1020.
description: Descriptive statistics, scatter plots, correlation, line of best fit. Elementary probability theory. Confidence intervals and hypothesis tests using normal, t and binomial distributions. Use of computer software. Formal treatment of statistical analyses and the role of probability in statistical inference.
